web_snippets: Biography. Born only days before the release of Silence of the Lambs, Adam Carnevale has tried to live his life by the code laid down in that movie ever since.
Adam Carnevale is the official Dungeon Master for D&D is for Nerds and the only person he knows who is confident enough to say he can perform a handstand.
Did Adam Carnevale get anyone else in D&D? It can't be just me ... There is a lot of insight in House RUles (mainly if you're a D&D ...
